DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect different fat type postprandial glucose control patient type 1 diabetes . Subjects several admission , random order , receive lunch identical carbohydrate content different fat content : lunch A minimal fat content , lunch B contain add butter , lunch C contain add olive oil , lunch D contain add cheese . Total fat content lunch B-D . Subjects receive identical insulin dos ( calculate use subject 's usual insulin-to-carbohydrate ratio ) meal . The investigator hypothesize , despite identical carbohydrate content , lunch high saturate fat lead postprandial hyperglycemia lunch contain minimal fat lunch high monounsaturated fat . The hypothesis time point 0-180 minute area curve Lunches A , B , C , D , whereas time point 180-360 minute Lunch B D great Lunch A C .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects study adult type 1 diabetes use insulin pump diabetes self-management . Prior admission clinical research center basal rate insulin-to-carbohydrate ratio subject optimize use standard clinical procedure . Subjects admit clinical research center mid-morning follow light breakfast home . Subjects several admission , random order , receive lunch identical carbohydrate content different fat content : lunch A minimal fat content , lunch B contain add butter , lunch C contain add olive oil , lunch D contain add cheese . Total fat content lunch B-D . Subjects receive identical insulin dos ( calculate use subject 's usual insulin-to-carbohydrate ratio ) meal . Blood sample measurement plasma glucose insulin level draw subsequent 6 hour . We hypothesize postprandial glucose level 3-6 hour start meal high follow lunch B D , compare lunch A C .
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( age 1875 year ) type 1 diabetes > 3 year . On insulin pump therapy . A1c < 8.5 % . History symptom suggestive gastric dysmotility , celiac disease , pancreatic exocrine dysfunction condition cause malabsorption maldigestion . Eating disorder . Diet allergy . Special diet restriction , vegan nut allergy . Medications know affect insulin sensitivity ( glucocorticoid ) affect gastrointestinal motility ( reglan ) . Hightitre insulin autoantibody delay insulin kinetics . Women breast feeding , pregnant , want become pregnant .
